level.heading: Insurers and health maintenance organizations continuing obligations.
level.text: Any insurer or health maintenance organization whose license has been revoked, cancelled, terminated, or surrendered shall continue to be bound by the obligations of this chapter including payment of all assessments, regardless of whether the insurer or health maintenance organization continues to do business in the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-40
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-40, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-1201.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-235
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-235, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-1201.
